text:
(1)
Union Cemetery, Knickerbocker to Irving Aves., Palmetto Street to Putnam Ave. The frame building in the center, is No. 621 Knickerbocker Ave; the building to the left of it, stands on the S.E. corner of Woodbine Street. The north side of Palmetto Street, appears in the background.

1897.

Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.

(2)
The same, looking north and northwest across the cemetery.

1897.

Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.
title: Cemeteries - Union Cemetery - Brooklyn.
